overview: Jeff Schramm graduated from the University of Alabama with a Bachelor of Science in Corporate Finance and Investment Management. Jeff Schramm has used his academic background to establish successful financial roles with a variety of key companies. At present, Jeff Schramm is the Chief Financial Officer at Lehigh Technologies, a company that uses proprietary milling technology to cryogenically grind rubber from end of life tires into an ultra-fine powder headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia. Jeff Schramm has been with the firm since early 2009, advancing key strategic maneuvers for the industry-leading organization. In addition to his work at Lehigh, Jeff Schramm has served in high level financial and accounting roles at Milliken & Co., Vulcan Chemicals and Kemira Chemicals. A resident of Milton, Georgia, Jeff Schramm promotes community entrepreneurship through membership with several local professional and volunteer organizations.
